alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 12:52AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Numerous Thunderstorms Could Bring Rounds of Hail and Downpours Overnight... At 1245 am, numerous thunderstorms extended across southern Minnesota into far west central Wisconsin. Some of these storms have been growing stronger and could produce hail along with downpours. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hayfield around 1255 AM CDT. Rochester around 115 AM CDT. Eyota around 135 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Potsdam, Chimney Rock, Highway 88 And County O, County Roads 28 And 31, Hidden Meadows R V Park, Mayville, Kings Park, Highway 30 And County 15, Oxbow Park, and Pleasantville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 91. Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 176 and 179, and between mile markers 196 and 255. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
